E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Progress of Tommy Tipler
Dear Sir,
Tommy Tipler has nothing more to prove at A Marshall Thundering Herd!
He has an ERA of 2.36 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Freeman Hoose
Dear Sir,
Freeman Hoose has an AVG of .380 at A Marshall Thundering Herd!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Sunday, 5/11/1985
Subject: Status of Phillip Gephart
Dear Sir,
Phillip Gephart shouldn't play at AA Patriot Games!
He has an AVG of .248 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/21/1985
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Dan Lilley



Date: Friday, 5/23/1985
Subject: Wondering
Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not
good enough to play regularly for this
team? I'm not a happy camper right now. If that doesn't
change, trade me!

Regards,
Deon Castillo
